thread.section_title: Easy Comforts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Comforts | www.easycomforts.com
thread.title: MELANIE FAITHWALKER
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by MELANIE FAITHWALKER

author: MELANIE FAITHWALKER
title: MELANIE FAITHWALKER
text:
Hi, My name is Melanie. I was very satisfied with Easy Comforts. I still keep finding things out of that magazine that help my family! I must say that Easy Comforts had something for everyone in the household. I would consider the items "must haves".... "that make life easier!"
Thank you,
Melanie
